def_cn: 有志向的；有抱负的；一心想出人头地的
def_en: If you describe someone as aspirational, you mean that they have strong hopes of moving to a higher social status.

def_cn: （产品）励志的，激励人心的，受到志向远大者欣赏的
def_en: If you describe a product as aspirational, you mean that it is bought or enjoyed by people who have strong hopes of moving to a higher social class.
